definition: movement once around a course, to form a circle around
details:
noun
- movement once around a course
= synonyms: lap
- any circular or rotating mechanism
= example: any circular or rotating mechanism
= synonyms: round
- a curved section or tier of seats in a hall or theater or opera house
= synonyms: dress circle
- street names for flunitrazepan
= synonyms: roach, rophy, rope, roofy, forget me drug
- a road junction at which traffic streams circularly around a central island
= synonyms: rotary, roundabout, traffic circle
- an unofficial association of people or groups
= synonyms: set, band, lot
- ellipse in which the two axes are of equal length
- something approximating the shape of a circle
= example: something approximating the shape of a circle
verb
- to form a circle around
= example: to form a circle around
= synonyms: encircle
- to travel around something
= example: to travel around something
- to move in circles
= synonyms: circulate
